meanings.sent1: The pupils were excited for the field trip.
meanings.sent2: The teacher counted the pupils in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The pupils giggled when the teacher made a funny joke.
meanings.sent4: The pupils of the school were like bright stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pupils learned about animals in science class.

meanings.definition: The dark circular opening in the center of the iris of the eye, through which light enters.
meanings.sent1: Her pupils dilated in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent2: The doctor shone a light to check the pupils' reaction.
meanings.sent3: The pupils in her eyes looked like tiny black holes.
meanings.sent4: His pupils were as dark as the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The bright light made her pupils shrink.
